skills.name: Benevolence
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can give any amount of hand cards to any other players.  If the total number of cards given away is 2 or more, you regain 1 health.

skills.name: Rouse
skills.description: Monarch Ability: You can ask any Shu characters to use a [Strike] for you.

skills.name: Stargazing
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can view X number of cards from the top of the deck (X equals to the number of players still in play with X having maximum of 5). Of these X cards, you can choose any number of cards to place at the top of the pile and rest are to be placed at the bottom of the pile.

skills.name: Desolate
skills.description: Enforced Ability: When you have no hand cards, you cannot become the target of [Strike] or [Duel].

skills.name: Dragonheart
skills.description: You can use hand cards [Strike] as [Dodge], and [Dodge] as [Strike].

skills.name: Paladin
skills.description: You can use any ♥ or ♦ suit cards as [Strike].

skills.name: Enlightenment
skills.description: Every time you use a non delayed scroll card (before it activates), you can immediately draw 1 card.

skills.name: Prodigy
skills.description: Any scroll cards you use have no range limit.

skills.name: Horsemanship
skills.description: Enforced Ability: You will always have -1 distance in any range calculations.

skills.name: Ironsteed
skills.description: When you use [Strike] on any target player, you can choose to make a Judgement. If the Judgement Result is a ♥ or ♦, the [Strike] cannot be evaded by a [Dodge].

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can use any number of [Strike].

skills.name: Formation
skills.description: Enforced Ability: When you have no armour equipped, it will always appear as if you have [Eight Trigrams] equipped.

skills.name: Arson
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can use any ♥ or ♦ suit hand cards as [Fire Attack].

skills.name: Decipher
skills.description: You can use any ♠ or ♣ hand cards as [Ward].

skills.name: Shackle
skills.description: You can use any ♣ hand cards as [Chain].

skills.name: Nirvana
skills.description: Restricted Ability: When you are on the brink of death, you can choose to discard all your cards and reset to unchained state. Then resurrect to 3 health and draw 3 cards.

skills.name: Fearsome Archer
skills.description:
During your playing phase, you can make your [Strike] not evadable by [Dodge] under either of these circumstances: 
1. The number of hand cards of the target player is less than or equal to your attacking range. 
2. The number of hand cards of the target player is more than or equal to your health.

skills.name: Mad Bone
skills.description: Enforced Ability: Whenever you deal damage to any player within physical range of 1, you regain 1 health for every 1 damage dealt.

skills.name: Mastermind
skills.description: Enforced Ability: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. You will be the source of any damage dealt by the use of [Barbarian Invasion].

skills.name: Rise Again
skills.description: During your drawing phase, if you are not at full health, you can choose to give up the drawing phase and instead, flip X number of cards from the deck (X being the amount of health you've currently lost). Of these X cards, you will gain 1 health for every ♥ suit card. The ♥ suit cards will be discarded while the remaining cards will be kept into your hand.

skills.name: Giant Elephant
skills.description: Enforced Ability: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. When any other players use [Barbarian Invasion] and the card's effects are concluded, you will acquire that card.

skills.name: Fiery Edge
skills.description: Whenever you use [Strike] to deal damage, you can choose to Compare Cards. If you win you take 1 card from the target.
